code: import React from"react";import ReactDOM from"react-dom";import{Admin,Resource,fetchUtils}from"react-admin";import jsonServerProvider from"ra-data-json-server";var httpClient=function httpClient(url){var options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};options.user={authenticated:true,token:'Bearer '+localStorage.getItem('token')};console.log(localStorage.getItem('token'));return fetchUtils.fetchJson(url,options);};var dataProvider=jsonServerProvider("https://findar-api-staging.herokuapp.com",httpClient);export default dataProvider;
